Question
========
Why are branches useful?

Answerlist
----------
* They permanently delete old commits
* They make repositories private
* They force everyone to work on the same files
* They let you isolate work before merging into main

Solution
========
Branches allow separate work without affecting the main branch until you merge.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
